metadata.name: Modify Group Policy Settings
metadata.comment: Detect malicious GPO modifications can be used to implement many other malicious behaviors.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\reg.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('reg.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\software\\\\policies\\\\microsoft\\\\windows\\\\system')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('grouppolicyrefreshtimedc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('grouppolicyrefreshtimeoffsetdc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('grouppolicyrefreshtime')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('grouppolicyrefreshtimeoffset')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('enablesmartscreen')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shellsmartscreenlevel'))))

output.summary: Detect malicious GPO modifications can be used to implement many other malicious behaviors.
